abstract: I first read "The Turn of the Screw" at my aunt's creepy old house with floor-to-ceiling windows. Looking up from the book, I kept expecting to see Quint and Miss Jessel's reflections burned into the glass panes.
snippet: I first read "The Turn of the Screw" at my aunt's creepy old house with floor-to-ceiling windows. Looking up from the book, I kept expecting to see Quint and Miss Jessel's reflections burned into the glass panes.
